sources.title: WAGON WHEELS
sources.description: Western --- Wagon Wheels ---- Randoldh Scott ---- 1934 The trio of pioneers, Belmet, Burch and O'Meary are leading a wagon train west and Murdock is out to stop them.

sources.title: Wagon Wheels (1934) RANDOLPH SCOTTüçïZANE GREY
sources.description:
Stars: Randolph Scott, Gail Patrick, Billy Lee
Director: Charles Barton
Writer: Zane Grey (novel)

Three veteran scouts are leading a wagon train of settlers to the Oregon Territory. Fearing that an influx of settlers and merchants-to-follow would tear down his empire of fur-trading and exploitation of the Indians, Murdock has his henchmen pose as Indians in an effort to halt the western expansion.

sources.title: Wagon Wheels (1934) Action, Adventure, Comedy Full Length Movie
sources.description:
Frontier Busters....Fighting Men...In an Epic of the Oregon Trail! 
In 1844 scout Clint Belmet and his two sidekicks guide a wagon train to the newly opened Oregon territory despite hardships and attacks.
Director: Charles Barton
Writers: Zane Grey, Jack Cunningham 
Stars: Randolph Scott, Gail Patrick, Monte Blue 
Genres: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Romance, Western

metadata.Plot: The trio of Belmet, Burch, and O'Meary are leading a wagon train west and Murdock is out to stop them. The settlers fight off his initial Indian attack and reach the mountains. With the wagon train vulnerable as it crosses a river, Murdock has the Indians make a final attack.
metadata.Writer: Zane Grey, Jack Cunningham, Carl A. Buss
metadata.Actors: Randolph Scott, Gail Patrick, Billy Lee
